entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Papineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:17 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 5:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 49 %
Dewpoint: -8.6°C
Wind: E 21 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening then changing to freezing rain overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle late this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm over northern sections. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain or freezing rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to periods of rain in the morning. High 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then mainly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
